description: Accurate time is required for a number of reasons, including scheduling, display and validating security materials. Matter Specification R1.3                        Connectivity Standards Alliance Document 23-27349 April 17, 2024 This section describes a mechanism for Nodes to achieve and maintain time synchronization. The Time Synchronization cluster provides attributes for reading a Node’s current time. It also allows
